Description: Gold necklace comprising of thin flat gold oval-shaped links joined together by thin wires upon which are threaded 12 small circular dark glass/ glazed composition beads; hook and loop fastening: the loop is attached to a link comprising several strands of gold wire twisted together.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Amathus
Bibliographic references: Jewellery / Catalogue of the Jewellery, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum. (2712)
Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p.118, Tomb 65; pl. XIV, 17)
Laffineur et al. 1986 / Amathonte III. Testimonia 3. L'Orfèvrerie. Scarabées, scaraboïdes et cônes. La coupe en argent du British Museum (No. 88, p.28 & fig.22)
SCE IV/3 / Swedish Cyprus Expedition (p. 120, Finger Ring no. 3)
